response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. We believe this amount not only reflects the product's true value but also provides a fair deal for both parties. We look forward to discussing this proposal further and potentially welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this remarkable product.", "product_price": 1200000}
